txt_en: For thousands of years, mountains and rivers are the answer.
There is nothing permanent except change.
txt_cn: 除了变化，没有什么是永恒的。

txt_en: The world is before you and you need not take it or leave it as it was when you came in.
txt_cn: 世界在你跟前，而你不一定要接受或维持它原先的样子。

txt_en: Today was good. Today was fun. Tomorrow is another one.
txt_cn: 不论今天过得很好还是过得很有趣。 明天都是新的开始。

txt_en: Forgiveness is the oil of relationships.
txt_cn: 原谅是人际关系的润滑油。

txt_en: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.
txt_cn: 大家都只想着改变世界，却从没想过先改变自己

txt_en: Play to your strengths. If you aren't great at something, do more of what you’re great at.
txt_cn: 善用你的优势。 多做你擅长的事情而不是那些你不擅长的事。

txt_en: Everything that is happening at this moment is a result of the choices you've made in the past.
txt_cn: 此刻所发生的所有事，都是你过去选择的结果。

txt_en: Things change. And friends leave. Life doesn't stop for anybody.
txt_cn: 事情会改变，朋友会离去。 生命不会为了任何人而停歇。

txt_en: Failure is another steppingstone to greatness.
txt_cn: 失败是抵达卓越的另一个踏脚石。

txt_en: Times and conditions change so rapidly that we must keep our aim constantly focused on the future.
txt_cn: 时代和环境变化非常快速，因此我们必须持续将目光聚焦在未来。

txt_en: He that is over-cautious will accomplish little.
txt_cn: 过分谨慎的人难有成就。
